snippet: The court ruled that evidence in the case, which involved 236 defendants, was tampered with and ordered the suspects released.
abstract: Istanbul court acquits 236 military officers after prosecutor says evidence used to convicted them in 2012, as participants in treasonous Sledgehammer plot, was forged.
lead_paragraph: The court ruled that evidence in the case, which involved 236 defendants, was tampered with and ordered the suspects released.

headline.main: Court in Turkey Acquits Military Officers of Trying to Overthrow Government
headline.print_headline: urkey: Officers Are Acquitted in Retrial

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
